game.name: Bitsies: I Caught a Strange Creature Roaming on My Desktop and Now I Raise Them in My Tiny Garden
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Family Sharing
